p: Finally, Zika studies were conducted in Oceania, the Caribbean, Africa and Latin America, with three studies in French Polynesia [ 161, 165, 165], one in Micronesia [ 8], one in the French Indies (Martinique) [ 159], one in Zambia [ 156], one in Cameroon [ 158], one in French Guiana [ 160] and one in Bolivia [ 162] ( Fig 3D).
